ValidationRule.description: Criteria: Cannot contain 1, 0, I, O or have more than two consecutive letters. Must be 6 characters long and the first character must be a letter.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNULL($Setup.Campaign_Code_Generator__c.Enabled_Record_Types__c)), CONTAINS($Setup.Campaign_Code_Generator__c.Enabled_Record_Types__c, RecordTypeId), $User.Alias != 'sinte', $Setup.Automation_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c != true, NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Coupon_Code__c), "test")), OR(ISCHANGED(Coupon_Code__c),ISNEW()), NOT(ISBLANK(Coupon_Code__c)), LEN(Coupon_Code__c) != 3, OR( NOT(REGEX(Coupon_Code__c, "^[M|A]{1}[0-9]{5}$")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Criteria: Code must start with 'M' followed by 5 numbers.
